net.corda.core.serialization

Class SerializedBytes<T>

  • ByteSequence
    • net.corda.core.utilities.OpaqueBytes
      • net.corda.core.serialization.SerializedBytes<T>

  • public class SerializedBytes<T>
extends OpaqueBytes

    A type safe wrapper around a byte array that contains a serialised object. You can call SerializedBytes.deserialize to get the original object back.

    • Field Detail

      • Companion

        public static net.corda.core.serialization.SerializedBytes.Companion Companion

    • Constructor Detail

      • SerializedBytes

        public SerializedBytes(@NotNull
                       kotlin.Array[] bytes)

        A type safe wrapper around a byte array that contains a serialised object. You can call SerializedBytes.deserialize to get the original object back.

        @JvmStatic
 @JvmOverloads
 @NotNull
public static <T> SerializedBytes<T> from(@NotNull
                                                                              T obj,
                                                                              @NotNull
                                                                              SerializationFactory serializationFactory,
                                                                              @NotNull
                                                                              SerializationContext context)

        Serializes the given object and returns a class SerializedBytes wrapper for it. An alias for Any.serialize intended to make the calling smoother for Java users.

        See Also:
        class SerializedBytes, Any.serialize
